required: The column position of the gadget.
The row position of the gadget.

scopes.delete:project:jira: Delete projects and their details, such as issue types, project lead, and avatars.
scopes.manage:jira-configuration: Configure Jira settings that require the Jira administrators permission, for example, create projects and custom fields, view workflows, manage issue link types.
scopes.manage:jira-project: Create and edit project settings and create new project-level objects, for example, versions, components.
scopes.manage:jira-webhook: Manage Jira webhooks. Enables an OAuth app to register and unregister dynamic webhooks in Jira. It also provides for fetching of registered webhooks.
scopes.read:email-address:jira: View email addresses of all users regardless of the user's profile visibility settings.
scopes.read:jira-user: View user information in Jira that you have access to, including usernames, email addresses, and avatars.
scopes.read:jira-work: Read project and issue data. Search for issues and objects associated with issues (such as attachments and worklogs).
scopes.write:avatar:jira: Create and update system and custom avatars.
scopes.write:comment.property:jira: Create and update issue comment properties.
scopes.write:field-configuration-scheme:jira: Create and update field configuration schemes.
scopes.write:field.default-value:jira: Create and update field default values.
scopes.write:filter.default-share-scope:jira: Create and update filter default share scopes.
scopes.write:issue-link-type:jira: Create and update issue link types.
scopes.write:issue-type-scheme:jira: Create and update issue type schemes.
scopes.write:issue-type-screen-scheme:jira: Create and update issue type screen schemes.
scopes.write:issue-type.property:jira: Create and update issue type properties.
scopes.write:issue-worklog.property:jira: Create and update issue worklog properties.
scopes.write:issue.remote-link:jira: Create and update issue remote links.
scopes.write:issue.time-tracking:jira: Create and update issue time trackings.
scopes.write:jira-work: Create and edit issues in Jira, post comments, create worklogs, and delete issues.
